title: Prepare Partnership Return (Form 1065)
description: A partnership with two partners needs its annual income tax return prepared.

tasks.description: Input the partnership's income and expenses from its financial statements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly enters all financial data onto Form 1065.

tasks.description: Allocate the net income and other tax items to the partners based on the partnership agreement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly allocates all items according to the partners' ownership percentages.

tasks.description: Prepare Schedule K-1 for each partner.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates an accurate Schedule K-1 for both partners to use on their personal returns.
